text: Patrik Blahút (born 7 October 1997) is a Slovak football midfielder who currently plays for Fortuna Liga club FK Pohronie. ==Club career== ===FK Pohronie=== Blahút made his Fortuna Liga debut for Pohronie in the club's premier first division match against Slovan Bratislava on 20 July 2019 at Mestský štadión.POHRONIE VS. SLOVAN BRATISLAVA 1 - 3 20.07.2019, soccerway.com ==References== ==External links== * FK Pohronie official club profile * Fortuna Liga profile * * Futbalnet profile Category:1997 births Category:Living people Category:People from Žarnovica District Category:Slovak footballers Category:Association football midfielders Category:FK Pohronie players Category:Slovak Super Liga players Category:2. title: Patrik Blahút
